message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split. This offers a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money in future rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  While I value fairness, the potential for inflation makes it crucial for me to secure a larger portion now.
Considering the inflation impact, I propose a 55/45 split. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
